attributes.action: the right to access treatments that have not completed clinical testing
attributes.additional_details:
This is a very simple petition the idea is if you are dying of a incurable disease instead of booking that trip to switzeralnd (i.e. ending it all (suicide)).

You can throw dice for one more time and take drugs which have not completed clinical testing.
The fact is if your willing to end your life you might as well throw the dice (gamble your life) and see if a experimental drug will help you.

This of course would be strictly voluntary, but if there is no cure or even treatment why not try it.

In Israel they do this and give there own people a fighting chance to live.
